trans-unit.source: System is running in Composer Mode
trans-unit.target: System is running in Composer Mode

trans-unit.source: The system is running in composer mode, the path to the `typo3` executable could not be reliably determined. By default, the command to run in composer mode is `vendor/bin/typo3 scheduler:run`.
trans-unit.target: The system is running in composer mode, the path to the `typo3` executable could not be reliably determined. By default, the command to run in composer mode is `vendor/bin/typo3 scheduler:run`.

trans-unit.target: Task "%s" with uid "%s" has been executed.

trans-unit.source: Invalid frequency. Please enter either a number of seconds or a valid cron command. The cron parser said: %1$s [code: %2$d].
trans-unit.target: Invalid frequency. Please enter either a number of seconds or a valid cron command. The cron parser said: %1$s [code: %2$d].

trans-unit.target: Please enter a sleep time greater or equal to 0 (zero).

trans-unit.target: The Scheduler was last started (%1$s) on %2$s at %3$s and ended on %4$s at %5$s.

trans-unit.target: A running task may not be deleted.

trans-unit.target: No frequency was defined, either as an interval or as a cron command.

trans-unit.target: The Scheduler has never yet run or the information about the last run has been lost.

trans-unit.source: There are currently no task classes available at all. To be able to create new tasks, you must either enable the samples provided by the Scheduler or install some other extension that relies on the Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: There are currently no task classes available at all. To be able to create new tasks, you must either enable the samples provided by the Scheduler or install some other extension that relies on the Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: The selected task class could not be found. You should probably contact the task's developers.
trans-unit.target: The selected task class could not be found. You should probably contact the task's developers.

trans-unit.source: The selected task type must be either "single execution" or "recurring execution".
trans-unit.target: The selected task type must be either "single execution" or "recurring execution".

trans-unit.target: Task "%s" with uid "%s" has not been executed.

trans-unit.target: Scheduling of task "%1$s" failed with the following message: %2$s

trans-unit.target: Toggling disabled state of task "%1$s" failed with the following message: %2$s

trans-unit.target: Stopping task "%1$s" failed with the following message: %2$s

trans-unit.source: The execution failed, but the error message could not be retrieved (it was probably too large). Sorry.
trans-unit.target: The execution failed, but the error message could not be retrieved (it was probably too large). Sorry.

trans-unit.source: Some of the selected cache backends do not exist. Please select valid backends only.
trans-unit.target: Some of the selected cache backends do not exist. Please select valid backends only.

trans-unit.source: Please select at least one cache backend.
trans-unit.target: Please select at least one cache backend.

trans-unit.source: The following tasks are broken. If your task doesn't have a registered class, you should consider reinstalling the extension that provided them or simply deleting the task. In case the error is "Cannot unserialize [class]", the announced class must be removed from your task class, as it is not allowed to be used due to security reasons. Please check also if any of the listed tasks have to be recreated manually (which can be necessary after an extension update due to breaking changes or missing migration scripts).
trans-unit.target: The following tasks are broken. If your task doesn't have a registered class, you should consider reinstalling the extension that provided them or simply deleting the task. In case the error is "Cannot unserialize [class]", the announced class must be removed from your task class, as it is not allowed to be used due to security reasons. Please check also if any of the listed tasks have to be recreated manually (which can be necessary after an extension update due to breaking changes or missing migration scripts).

trans-unit.source: The current class (%s) could not be found. Change it below or consider deleting this task altogether.
trans-unit.target: The current class (%s) could not be found. Change it below or consider deleting this task altogether.

trans-unit.source: %s registered scheduler tasks can not be executed
trans-unit.target: %s registered scheduler tasks can not be executed

trans-unit.source: This screen checks if the requisites for running the Scheduler as a cron job are fulfilled. It also displays information about the last run of the Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: This screen checks if the requisites for running the Scheduler as a cron job are fulfilled. It also displays information about the last run of the Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: All dates and times in the Scheduler are measured according to the server's time, as the Scheduler is run purely on the server-side.
trans-unit.target: All dates and times in the Scheduler are measured according to the server's time, as the Scheduler is run purely on the server-side.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to mark this task as not running? Note that this will not stop the actual script (if unsure please refer to the manual).
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to mark this task as not running? Note that this will not stop the actual script (if unsure please refer to the manual).

trans-unit.target: The task could not be marked as non-running.

trans-unit.target: The task was successfully marked as non-running.

trans-unit.target: The requested task (UID: %d) was not found.

trans-unit.source: Task "%s" with uid "%s" has been enabled.
trans-unit.target: Task "%s" with uid "%s" has been enabled.

trans-unit.target: Task "%s" with uid "%s" has been disabled.

trans-unit.source: Task "%s" with uid "%s" has been enabled and queued for execution at next scheduler CLI run.
trans-unit.target: Task "%s" with uid "%s" has been enabled and queued for execution at next scheduler CLI run.

trans-unit.source: Task "%s" with uid "%s" has been queued for execution at next scheduler CLI run.
trans-unit.target: Task "%s" with uid "%s" has been queued for execution at next scheduler CLI run.

trans-unit.source: Run task on next cron job
trans-unit.target: Run task on next cron job

trans-unit.source: This task calls the garbage collection of configured caching framework caches which use one of the selected backends. This will free some space in cache backends which do not have an internal garbage collection. In case of the default database backend it is advisable to run this task once a day when the database is mostly idle.
trans-unit.target: This task calls the garbage collection of configured caching framework caches which use one of the selected backends. This will free some space in cache backends which do not have an internal garbage collection. In case of the default database backend it is advisable to run this task once a day when the database is mostly idle.

trans-unit.source: Runs indexing tasks based on an indexing configuration and a storage/folder information.
trans-unit.target: Runs indexing tasks based on an indexing configuration and a storage/folder information.

trans-unit.source: File Abstraction Layer: Update storage index
trans-unit.target: File Abstraction Layer: Update storage index

trans-unit.source: Updates the Index/Cache Data of a Storage; only needed if changes to the storage are possible outside the backend (FTP, RemoteStorages).
trans-unit.target: Updates the Index/Cache Data of a Storage; only needed if changes to the storage are possible outside the backend (FTP, RemoteStorages).

trans-unit.source: File Abstraction Layer: Extract metadata in storage
trans-unit.target: File Abstraction Layer: Extract metadata in storage

trans-unit.source: Extracts metadata for all files in storage which have been changed since last run.
trans-unit.target: Extracts metadata for all files in storage which have been changed since last run.

trans-unit.source: Task to delete old entries from specific tables like sys_log. Use $GLOBALS['TYPO3_CONF_VARS']['SC_OPTIONS']['scheduler']['tasks']['tx_scheduler_TableGarbageCollection']['options']['tables'] to configure tables. Refer to the manual for more details.
trans-unit.target: Task to delete old entries from specific tables like sys_log. Use $GLOBALS['TYPO3_CONF_VARS']['SC_OPTIONS']['scheduler']['tasks']['tx_scheduler_TableGarbageCollection']['options']['tables'] to configure tables. Refer to the manual for more details.

trans-unit.source: This task empties all "_recycler_" folders below fileadmin. This helps free some space in the file system.
trans-unit.target: This task empties all "_recycler_" folders below fileadmin. This helps free some space in the file system.

trans-unit.source: Allows regular console commands to be configured and executed through the scheduler framework.
trans-unit.target: Allows regular console commands to be configured and executed through the scheduler framework.

trans-unit.source: This task executes "OPTIMIZE TABLE" statements on the selected database tables. This helps to reduce storage space and improve I/O efficiency. Warning! Tables will be locked during the optimization process.
trans-unit.target: This task executes "OPTIMIZE TABLE" statements on the selected database tables. This helps to reduce storage space and improve I/O efficiency. Warning! Tables will be locked during the optimization process.

trans-unit.source: Anonymize IP addresses in database tables
trans-unit.target: Anonymize IP addresses in database tables

trans-unit.source: This task anonymizes the IP addresses to enforce the privacy of the persisted data.
trans-unit.target: This task anonymizes the IP addresses to enforce the privacy of the persisted data.

trans-unit.source: Handle entries older than given number of days
trans-unit.target: Handle entries older than given number of days

trans-unit.source: Last byte for IPv4 / Interface ID for IPv6
trans-unit.target: Last byte for IPv4 / Interface ID for IPv6

trans-unit.source: Last 2 bytes for IPv4 / Interface & SLA ID for IPv6
trans-unit.target: Last 2 bytes for IPv4 / Interface & SLA ID for IPv6

trans-unit.source: Every day-of-week from Monday through Friday at 09:00 and 15:00
trans-unit.target: Every day-of-week from Monday through Friday at 09:00 and 15:00

trans-unit.source: It seems the Scheduler has never yet run. Please check your configuration.
trans-unit.target: It seems the Scheduler has never yet run. Please check your configuration.
